data.name: Bless Online: Festive Soiree - New year's Edition
data.detailed_description:
This DLC contains the Bless Online: Festive Soiree Pack - New Year’s Edition. This commemorative pack includes exclusive costumes and convenience items.

The Bless Online: Festive Soiree Pack - New Year’s Edition can be downloaded only once per account. As all components are character bound, so please collect the DLC only with the character you wish to use it on.

Bless Online: Festive Soiree - New year Edition Includes the following:

  • Exclusive Costume (Snowfall Gala Set)
    Transform your character with the beautiful and wintry Snowfall Gala costume.

  • Exclusive Costume (Jubilee Set)
    Transform your character with a pure white costume perfect for a special day!

  • Character Slot Expansion Item (x 1)
    Explore Bless with even more characters by using the Character Slot Expansion Item.

  • Memorization Scroll (x 3)
    Designate your own base with the Memorization Scroll!

  • Teleport Scroll (x 10)
    Quickly travel wherever, whenever with the Teleport Scroll.

To activate purchased DLC products in-game, please follow the steps below.
  • Purchase DLC product.
  • Log-on to Bless and open your account inbox.
  • Items will be automatically sent to your character’s mailbox.
    Once you collect the items from your mailbox, the item will automatically be added to the inventory of the character you used to accept the item


Note:
- The items will be sent individually to the account inbox. Please collect each item with the correct character.
- Please note that once the item has been collected to the character’s inventory, it cannot be transferred to another character.

data.short_description: This DLC contains the Bless Online: Festive Soiree Pack - New Year’s Edition. This commemorative pack includes exclusive costumes and convenience items.
data.supported_languages:
English*, German, Korean
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64bit) *Bless Online cannot be played on 32bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4670 / AMD FX8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX760 / AMD Radeon HD7870
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 55 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit) *Bless Online cannot be played on 32bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 7700 / AMD RYZEN 7 1700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX1060 / AMD Radeon RX580
  • Storage: 55 MB available space
